carpet.rule.flippinTotem.name: Flippin Totem
carpet.rule.flippinTotem.desc: Use totem of undying to change block's facing.
carpet.rule.betterPiglinAI.name: Better Piglin AI
carpet.rule.betterPiglinAI.desc: When triggered, a piglin that has picked up a golden carrot will retain only its bartering behavior.
carpet.rule.hightLightItem.name: Hightlight All Items
carpet.rule.hightLightItem.desc: When triggered, all items will be highlighted.
carpet.rule.fixEnderPearlTeleport.name: Fix EnderPearl Teleport
carpet.rule.fixEnderPearlTeleport.desc: Fixed a bug where ender pearls would fail to teleport their owner if the player logged out and back in without personally reloading the pearl's chunk.
carpet.rule.cancelZombifiedPiglinsBreakE: Zombified Piglins do not trample turtle eggs.
Zombified Piglins will not seek out and attempt to trample turtle eggs.
Reintroduce the older version of pathfinding.
Reintroduce the older version of the real-time-based pathfinding mechanism.
